email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Would you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 18-20 October to give us a bit more flexibility? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, yes, we can adjust the laycan to 18-20 October. The cargo size is confirmed at 140,000 metric tons. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with the agreed terms: $50.00 per metric ton, demurrage at $20,000 per day, and laycan 18-20 October. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Thanks for your help on this. Looking forward to working with you. Cheers, John.
